code: import React from"react";import{Col}from"reactstrap";import ServiceCard from"./ServiceCard";import weatherImg from"../assets/images/weather.png";import guideImg from"../assets/images/guide.png";import customizationImg from"../assets/images/customization.png";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var servicesData=[{imgUrl:weatherImg,title:"Caculate Weather",desc:"description service 1"},{imgUrl:guideImg,title:"Best Tour Guide",desc:"description service 2"},{imgUrl:customizationImg,title:"Customization",desc:"description service 3"}];var ServiceList=function ServiceList(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:servicesData.map(function(item,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{lg:"3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ServiceCard,{item:item})},index);})});};export default ServiceList;
